name: Escape Room (Horror) Try it now
description:
So there is someone chasing you. you run youre way to freedom. Finally u found a door and  u get in. that whas a big mistake..

Door locked...

And there is someone waiting for you. in the other room.

There is no other way, to face him in the other room.  bud then…………

Tik, tak , tik , tak … Time is running....

Get youre way out!

Follow me, so you know when Room 2 will he ready!

Feel free to Film-it, Play-it streams.

Just let me know if u made a video about it.
